title: Carlisle FoodService Products 4352802 Dallas Ware Melamine Nappie Bowl, 10oz Capacity, 4-61/64" Diameter x 1.81" Depth, White (Case of 48)
features: Stackable nappy bowl for home and commercial food service use
Made of melamine resin for durability and resistance to heat, stains, scratches, and breaking
Suitable for temperatures up to 212 degrees F
BPA-free to address food safety concerns raised by FDA and other organizations
description: This Carlisle 4352802 Dallas Ware 10 oz. white nappie bowl is a stackable bowl for home and commercial food service use. It is made of melamine resin for durability and resistance to stains, scratches, and breaking. This bowl is suitable for temperatures up to 212 degrees F, dishwasher-safe, and free of BPA (Bisphenol A) to address food safety concerns raised by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and other organizations. It meets NSF International standards for use in food handling and processing, and National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) standard PS25-70 for heavy duty melamine tableware. This bowl measures 1.81" high and 4.96" in diameter.

Carlisle manufactures food service equipment and supplies and sanitary maintenance tools and supplies for commercial, industrial, and institutional facilities. The company, founded in 1954, is headquartered in Oklahoma City, OK.
